item.title: test_rmd
item.description: This is a test generated Rmd file. This will test how the .Rmd is rendered into html by examining the creation of plots and code chunks. # This is a code chunk def hi_name(name): print(f"Hello, {name}!") hi_name("Jake") >>> "Hello, Jake!" Letâ€™s test the R code chunk print("This is an R code chunk") ## [1] "This is an R code chunk" ## a fast way to generate *sorted* U[0,1] random numbers: rsunif <- function(n) { n1 <- n+1 cE <- cumsum(rexp(n1)); cE[seq_len(n)]/cE[n1] } plot(rsunif(1000), ylim=0:1, pch=".
